医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
慢性压力可能会给年轻女性带来中风的风险美国神经病学医学杂志在线上发表的一项研究，有些人承受慢性压力的人的中风风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/chronic-stress-may-raise-naise-naise-rase-risk-for-younger-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/chronic-stress-may-raise-naise-naise-rase-risk-for-younger-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=D54BC9D-1A0B-4BE4-8DB0-1378AA5C1DB6 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:50:00 -0500 Chronic stress may raise stroke risk for younger women
非处方止痛药可能会缩短脑震荡恢复时间根据今天于2025年3月5日发布的初步研究，在脑震荡之后服用非处方止痛药的人可能比不服用止痛药的人更快地恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/over-the-counter-pain-medications-may-shorten-concussion-recovery time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/over-the-counter-pain-medications-may-shorten-concussion-recovery time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5DAC80F8-C61C-459A-459A-AFF2-43F2-43F0B8623CFD Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:47:13 -0500 Over-the-counter pain medications may shorten concussion recovery time
靶向纳米颗粒在防止胰腺癌扩散到肝脏方面显示出希望胰腺癌仍然是治疗最具挑战性的肿瘤之一，部分原因是当该疾病已经扩散或转移时，通常在晚期发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/targeted-nanoparticles-show-promise-inpomise-in-in-pancreatic-cancreatic-cancer-cancer-cancer-spread-the-liver.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/targeted-nanoparticles-show-promise-inpomise-in-parmise-in-pancreatic-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-cancer-spread-to-the-liver.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ccddc2d-67dd-43bf-9354-62c9aeae1c468c Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:43:14 -0500 Targeted nanoparticles show promise in preventing pancreatic cancer spread to the liver
早产儿的喂养策略不会改变大脑的生长或认知尽管最初的未经调整的关联，但在遵循标准化的临床指南时，早产儿的早期营养并不会显着影响大脑的生长或神经发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/feeding-strategies-in-prategies-in-preterm-infants-not-not-alter-alter-alter-brain-brain-browth-or-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/feeding-strategies-in-prategies-in-preterm-infants-infant-do-not-alter-alter-alter-brain-brain-growth-or-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4611f640-1EF1-4C9D-853F-853F-8E4C6B90A3B7 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:43:00 -0500 Feeding strategies in preterm infants do not alter brain growth or cognition
预测显示，到2050年，帕金森氏病病例将达到2520万到2050年，全世界将有2520万人患有帕金森氏病（与2021年增长112％），这主要是由于人口衰老，这表明BMJ今天发表的一项建模研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/projections-show-parkinsons-disease-cases-cases-cases-will-rach-rach-25.2亿-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/projections-show-parkinsons-disease-cases-cases-cases-will-rach-reach-25.2亿乘25.52亿，by-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8Adc96f9-f010-48fa-A51D-B851EE487C08 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:36:42 -0500 Projections show Parkinson's disease cases will reach 25.2 million by 2050
糖尿病药物可以减少癌症幸存者的心力衰竭根据东英吉利大学的新研究，一种常见的糖尿病药物可以帮助癌症患者更好地康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/diabetes-drug-could-reduce-hend-failure-in-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/diabetes-drug-could-reduce-hend-failure-in-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23b8e9e5-fb06-4248-87e1-47855af262478 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:23:05 -0500 Diabetes drug could reduce heart failure in cancer survivors
碳水化合物不是饥饿罪魁祸首：新的研究推翻了血糖指数驱动暴饮暴食的信念一项细胞代谢研究发现，虽然高gi餐峰值胰岛素和葡萄糖，但它们不会增加饥饿或持续驱动暴饮暴食，从而挑战了碳水化合物 - 胰岛素模型对肥胖的中心主张。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/carbs-arene28099t-the-hunger-culprit-culprit-new-research-vorearch-vorearch-overturns-belief-that------------------------ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/carbs-arene28099t-the-hunger-culprit-new-research-research-vorearch-overturns-belief-that----------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A8C09F25-6C47-4957-4957-938F-9EEB1C0AD5B1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:19:00 -0500 Carbs aren’t the hunger culprit: New research overturns belief that glycemic index drives overeating
研究表明，GLP-1药物对2型糖尿病的肾脏移植受者的好处一项新的研究表明，用新的抗肥胖药物治疗的2型糖尿病的肾脏移植受者较少经历器官衰竭，生存更长的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-shows-benefits-of-glp-1-drugs-for-kidney-transplant-ransplant-recipients-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-shows-benefits-of-glp-1-drugs-for-kidney-transplant-ransplant-recipients-with-type-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05159A2A-32BE-4A43-9F2A-972F6D26DE99 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:14:00 -0500 Study shows benefits of GLP-1 drugs for kidney transplant recipients with type 2 diabetes
新药候选人可能有助于对抗代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪分裂性肝病一项在《自然衰老》上发表的研究表明，有希望的新药候选者可能有助于打击代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪分裂性肝病（MASLD），这是一种慢性肝脏病，由于肥胖和糖尿病的高率，会对圣安东尼奥的社区产生不成比例的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-drug-candidate-may-help-combat-combat-metabolic-dysfunction-yspunction-sasseciated-setteatotic-liver-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-drug-candidate-may-help-combat-combat-metabolic-dysfunction-ysparciated- sasseciated-Steateat-liver-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a9b7c4c4c-a876-4b86-86-85c4-f5A5607D2730 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:07:21 -0500 New drug candidate may help combat metabolic dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease
NHS可以通过单一的“ polypill”策略来防止成千上万的心脏病发作和中风根据UCL的学者的说法，NHS每年都可以通过向英国50岁的每个人提供单一的“ polypill”，结合他汀类药物和三种血压降低药物，以防止成千上万的心脏病发作和中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/nhs-could-prevent-th----------------------of-of-heart-attacks-and-attacks-and-strokes-with-a-single-a-single-polypilpill-polypillypill-strategy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/nhs-could-prevent-prevent-th-------frevent-of-hert-hert-athacks-and-strokes-and-strokes-with-a-single-polypilpill-polypill-polypill-strategy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffd7acae-4c1c-41C0-91D6-60A5C1FF05B7 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 20:57:00 -0500 NHS could prevent thousands of heart attacks and strokes with a single "polypill" strategy
